Done by Abdulaiev Andrii. FCSC; group K-24. Lab #1 Task #11.

To add an expression to a cell simply select a cell and type in your expression into the f(x)= line. The program supports arithmetic operations + - * and ^ (pow); functions max() and min() taking 2 parameters and functions inc() and dec() taking 1 parameter. A user can add or remove rows and columns using the correspoding buttons. A user can save a table to a file; create new table; and open a .csv file with a table
